content: HAS-B-105 Anchor rod High-performance anchor rod for injectable adhesive mortars and adhesive HVU2 capsule (carbon steel, ASTM F1554 grade 105, zinc-plated) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Anchor rods & elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Large range of anchor rods (3/8 - 1-1/4) Designed for use with HVU adhesive capsules in solid concrete or with Hilti HIT injectable adhesive mortar in various base materials Fulfills the ductility requirements of CSA A 23.3 and ACI 318 Fully compliant with ASTM F1554 Custom lengths and additional diameters up to 2 Â½ available upon request Applications Suitable for fastenings in concrete and other base materials in combination with the relevant Hilti HIT injectable mortars Suitable for fastenings in concrete in combination with HVU adhesive capsules (3/8 to 1-1/4) 1/4 and 5/16 rods without chisel tip for use with HY 70 injectable mortar Suitable for ductile fastening points with predictable steel failure in seismic-relevant applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) | PROFIS Software | Yes | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry) | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Type of fixing | Pre-fastening ### ITEMS- 2197967 -
